name: Mirage Fizzle Kid
description:
Daughters of the sea, their spirits and flesh corroded by the sins of Destruction, leaving only empty, distorted shells... In this life, they follow the Ocean's honed blade, not to be obliterated into nihility, but to become the tidal waves crashing against the Dark Sun.
The apocalyptic storm descends from the heavens, heralding the extinction of all things.
O premature Mirage Fizzle, doomed to perish before birth, exhaling countless sorrows.
The murky amniotic fluid flows, staining heaven and earth black, tainting even newborn hope.

skills.name: Rumination of Putrid Dream
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one designated target. If there is any "Mirage Fizzle Kid" in the "Mirage Rush" state on the field, additionally deals Quantum DMG.

skills.name: Mirage Rush
skills.description: Enter the "Mirage Rush" state and locks on to one target. While in this state, other "Mirage Fizzle Kid" units will prioritize attacking the locked target. The state "Mirage Rush" is dispelled when this unit is Weakness Broken or receives a killing blow.

skills.name: Such Is the Fate of Bubbles
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Quantum DMG to targets adjacent to this unit.

skills.name: Respite By The Waters
skills.description: Advances action after taking a certain number of attacks from Basic ATK, Skill, Ultimate, or Memosprite Skill. When in the "<u>Revel in Destruction</u>" state, decreases the number of attacks required to advance action.
